title: 401. Q&AF: Gossip In The Workplace, Potential Executive & Mindset For Huge Power List Tasks
itunes:title: 401. Q&AF: Gossip In The Workplace, Potential Executive & Mindset For Huge Power List Tasks
description: In today's episode, Andy answers your questions on how to eliminate the toxic gossip in the workplace, what's the best way to screen for potential executives in your company, and what your mindset should be for tackling a massive Power List task.
content:encoded: In today's episode, Andy answers your questions on how to eliminate the toxic gossip in the workplace, what's the best way to screen for potential executives in your company, and what your mindset should be for tackling a massive Power List task.
